string-array.name: walkthrough_text
string-array.item: For RollWithMe to work, you\'ll first need to get started with a few simple steps. Swipe left to learn how.
You\'ll start by putting your Sphero on the ground near you.
Next, you\'ll be asked to hold your phone over your Sphero, like this.
Then, you\'ll use the camera view to center Sphero in the crosshairs.
Next, you\'ll touch the screen in the center of the crosshairs, causing Sphero to roll away from the center.
Hold your phone motionless during this step so that RollWithMe can measure Sphero\'s movement correctly.
Once Sphero stops moving and your screen turns magenta, setup will be complete. Ready? Press the button below to get going.
